events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, and their resume indicates strong backend development experience.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to keywords such as developer, software, and backend experience mentioned in the CV.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's process and ensure all screening steps are conducted timely.
Initial screening call completed, candidate demonstrated solid understanding of software development principles and relevant technical skills.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the role and the opportunity to further discuss technical details in an interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 5th at 10 AM UTC to evaluate coding and system design skills.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showcasing strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in key programming languages.
HR interview has been scheduled to assess the candidate's cultural fit and discuss benefits and employment conditions.
HR interview completed; candidate showed excellent communication skills and aligned well with our company values.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate including detailed compensation, benefits, and starting date.
Candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed eagerness to join the team pending a formal acceptance.
Candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming the start date and expressing commitment to contribute to the engineering team.
Onboarding process initiated with the new engineer, including setup of development environment and introductions to team members.
Hiring process officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and actively contributing to ongoing engineering projects.
